prompt: Design a sleek QR code scanner page with a dark theme background (black). Center a large square viewfinder with sharp corners and a glowing green border. Display the title 'Scan QR Code' at the top in bold white text. Below the viewfinder, add a subtle instructional text 'Align QR code within the frame' in light gray. Include a circular flashlight toggle button at the bottom with a white icon and 'Flash' label, using a green accent color when active. Place a gallery button in the top-left corner with a white icon for selecting images. Ensure the layout is clean, with ample padding and a modern, tech-inspired aesthetic.
